Crystal Cox (amụrụ na ọnwa Machị 28, na afọ 1979, na Norfolk, Virginia) bụ onye America na-eme egwuregwu track and field onye nọ na otu mba na 2004 Athens Summer Olympics ma pụta dị ka onye na-asọmupi na oge nke iri na asaa nke usoro ihe omume Survivor
Cox ritere ihe nrite ọla edo na 4x400 m relay ụmụ nwanyị na 2004 Athens Summer Olympics
E mechara napụ ya ọla edo n'afọ 2012 mgbe ọ kwetara na ọ na-eji ọgwụ ọjọọ eme ihe. N'Atens, ọ gbara ọsọ na agba nke mbụ mana ọ bụghị na nke ikpeazụ
DeeDee Trotter, Monique Henderson, Sanya Richards na Monique Hennagan gbara ọsọ na ngwụcha
N'afọ 2004, ọ bụ onye mmeri America nke 200m n'ime ụlọ.
Na ọnwa Jenụwarị 29, na afọ 2010, Associated Press na ESPN.com kọrọ na Cox kwetara na ọ na-eji anabolic steroids site na 2001 ruo 2004

N'ihi ya, ọ tụfuru nsonaazụ ya niile site n'oge ahụ, wee kweta na a ga-akwụsị ya afọ anọ nke gwụrụ na Jenụwarị 2014. IAAF atụwo aro ka e wepụ ihe nrite ha n'òtù egwuregwu Olympic 4x400 nke ụmụ nwanyị US nke afọ 2004. N'afọ 2013, ma IAAF na IOC kwupụtara na a ga-ekwe ka ndị otu America (ma e wezụga Cox) jide ihe nrite ọla edo ha.
Cox bụ otu n'ime ndị na-asọmupi na Survivor: Gabon, nke gosipụtara na Fall 2008. N'agbanyeghị ọzụzụ Olympic ya, Cox meriri 11 n'ime ihe ịma aka agbụrụ 13, ọ bụ ezie na ọ banyere na isii ikpeazụ
Njikọ ya bụ Kenny Hoang, Jessica "Sugar" Kiper, Susie Smith, na Matty Whitmore
Na Disemba 11, 2008, ihe omume, a họpụtara Cox wee bụrụ onye nke ise n'ime ndị ọka ikpe.
